thread.title: George and Amal Clooney are expecting twins, co-star Matt Damon confirms
thread.title_full: George and Amal Clooney are expecting twins, co-star Matt Damon confirms

author: SNAPPA Celebrity
title: George and Amal Clooney are expecting twins, co-star Matt Damon confirms
text:
George Clooney has confirmed he and his wife Amal are expecting twins, actor Matt Damon said.
Matt revealed he fought back tears when his Ocean‚Äôs Eleven co-star broke the news to him last year when Amal was just eight weeks‚Äô pregnant.
View photos
George Clooney (Anthony Devlin/PA) More He told Entertainment Tonight Canada: ‚ÄúI was working with him last fall and he pulled me aside on set and, I mean, I almost started crying.
‚ÄúI was so happy for him. And I was like, ‚ÄòHow far along is she?‚Äô And he goes, ‚ÄòEight weeks‚Äô.
View photos
Amal Clooney (Jonathan Brady/PA) More ‚Äú(I said) ‚ÄòAre you out of your mind? Don‚Äôt tell anybody else! Don‚Äôt tell anybody else! Don‚Äôt you know the 12-week rule?‚Äô Of course he doesn‚Äôt. I was like, ‚Äòjust shut up, man‚Äô.‚Äù
Matt, who was a guest at the Clooneys‚Äô wedding, added: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm thrilled for him. She‚Äôs amazing. He hit the jackpot. Just on every level. She is a remarkable woman. They‚Äôre going to be great.
‚ÄúThey‚Äôre going to be awesome parents. Those kids are lucky.‚Äù
View photos
Matt Damon (Ian West/PA) More George, 55, and renowned human rights barrister Amal, 39, married in Venice in September 2014.
US television show The Talk first reported the news of the pregnancy when host Julie Chen told viewers that ‚Äúthe twins are due this June‚Äù.
On #TheTalk today @JulieChen confirmed that George & wife #AmalClooney are due w/ twins IN JUNE! Congrats to the happy couple! üë∂üë∂ #BREAKING pic.twitter.com/0ALtxseI3Y
‚Äî The Talk (@TheTalkCBS) February 9, 2017
Read More
Rumours about a possible pregnancy started last month when Amal attended a Netflix screening in London apparently showing a baby bump.
They are not be the only celebrity parents expecting a multiple birth in 2017 ‚Äì Beyonce and her husband Jay-Z announced last week that they were expecting twins.
George has previously said he had thought about the prospect of becoming a father but ‚Äúit hasn‚Äôt been high on my list‚Äù.
View photos
David Miliband and George and Amal Clooney meeting Syrian families in Berlin in 2016 (Jeffry Ruigendijk/IRC) More He told CBS This Morning in 2015: ‚ÄúI‚Äôve been asked it a lot lately, because I‚Äôve gotten married and I am doing a movie with kids in it.
‚ÄúYou should see how different, how creative the way they ask me.‚Äù
Amal, whose family moved to Britain in the 1980s after fleeing the Lebanese Civil War, is known for having represented a string of high-profile clients including WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange and former Ukrainian prime minister Yulia Tymoshenko.
Representatives for the Clooneys could not be reached.
